argumentText:
ARGUMENT
s w

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_df-sdrg | |- SubDRing = ( w e. DivRing |-> { s e. ( SubRing ` w ) | ( w |`s s ) e. DivRing } ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_dmmptss | |- dom SubDRing C_ DivRing |
| 3 |  | #P_elfvdm | |- ( S e. ( SubDRing ` R ) -> R e. dom SubDRing ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_sseldi | |- ( S e. ( SubDRing ` R ) -> R e. DivRing ) |
| 5 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( w = R -> ( SubRing ` w ) = ( SubRing ` R ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_oveq1 | |- ( w = R -> ( w |`s s ) = ( R |`s s ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( w = R -> ( ( w |`s s ) e. DivRing <-> ( R |`s s ) e. DivRing ) ) |
| 8 | 5, 7 | #P_rabeqbidv | |- ( w = R -> { s e. ( SubRing ` w ) | ( w |`s s ) e. DivRing } = { s e. ( SubRing ` R ) | ( R |`s s ) e. DivRing } ) |
| 9 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( SubRing ` R ) e. _V |
| 10 | 9 | #P_rabex | |- { s e. ( SubRing ` R ) | ( R |`s s ) e. DivRing } e. _V |
| 11 | 8, 1, 10 | #P_fvmpt | |- ( R e. DivRing -> ( SubDRing ` R ) = { s e. ( SubRing ` R ) | ( R |`s s ) e. DivRing } ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_eleq2d | |- ( R e. DivRing -> ( S e. ( SubDRing ` R ) <-> S e. { s e. ( SubRing ` R ) | ( R |`s s ) e. DivRing } ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( s = S -> ( R |`s s ) = ( R |`s S ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( s = S -> ( ( R |`s s ) e. DivRing <-> ( R |`s S ) e. DivRing ) ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_elrab | |- ( S e. { s e. ( SubRing ` R ) | ( R |`s s ) e. DivRing } <-> ( S e. ( SubRing ` R ) /\ ( R |`s S ) e. DivRing ) ) |
| 16 | 12, 15 | #P_syl6bb | |- ( R e. DivRing -> ( S e. ( SubDRing ` R ) <-> ( S e. ( SubRing ` R ) /\ ( R |`s S ) e. DivRing ) ) ) |
| 17 | 4, 16 | #P_biadan2 | |- ( S e. ( SubDRing ` R ) <-> ( R e. DivRing /\ ( S e. ( SubRing ` R ) /\ ( R |`s S ) e. DivRing ) ) ) |
| 18 |  | #P_3anass | |- ( ( R e. DivRing /\ S e. ( SubRing ` R ) /\ ( R |`s S ) e. DivRing ) <-> ( R e. DivRing /\ ( S e. ( SubRing ` R ) /\ ( R |`s S ) e. DivRing ) ) ) |
| 19 | 17, 18 | #P_bitr4i | |- ( S e. ( SubDRing ` R ) <-> ( R e. DivRing /\ S e. ( SubRing ` R ) /\ ( R |`s S ) e. DivRing ) ) |
